body.content:
Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuh,


Hello Dearest One,

With a warm heart, I offer my friendship, and my greetings to you and I
hope this letter meets you in good health. It will be surprising to you to
receive this proposal from me since you do not know me personally. However,
I am sincerely seeking your confidence in this transaction, which I propose
with my free mind and as a person of integrity from God. My name is Mrs.
Josephine Gupta From Malaysia. I am married to Dr. Jonathan Gupta who
worked with the Malaysia embassy in Burkina Faso Ouagadougou for 12 years,
before he died in the year 2008.

We were married for eleven years without a child. He died after a brief
illness that lasted for four days. Before his death we were both born again
Christians. Since his death I have decided not to remarry or get a child
outside my matrimonial home which the Bible spoke against. When my husband
was alive he deposited the sum of €22 Million Euro lodged into consignment
boxes with the Security Guard Service Company in a country in West Africa
called Burkina Faso, Capital City Ouagadougou. Presently, this money is
still with the security company in Burkina Faso Ouagadougou. Recently my
doctor told me that it will take the grace of GOD for me to live for 3
months, due to cancer of the lungs.

Though what bothers me mostly is my stroke. Having known my condition I
decided to donate this fund to church and Mosque, Muslim or  Christian as
an individual that will use this fund for churches, orphanages home and
widows and also propagating the word of God and to ensure that the house of
God or Mosque is properly in good shape. The Bible made us understand that
blessed are the hands that giveth.

So, I took this unprecedented decision because I don`t have any child that
will inherit this money and my husband's relatives are too greedy, and they
might not use this fund as instructed, rather they will use it for their
selfish interest. And I don`t want my husband's hard earned money to be
misused by unbelievers. I don`t want a situation where this money will be
used in an ungodly manner, that is my reason for taking this bold decision.
I am not afraid of death because I know where I am going.

I know that I am going to be in the bosom of the Lord. Exodus 14:14 says
that the Lord shall fight for me, and I shall hold my peace. I can only
communicate with you via email through my doctor, because of my health
challenge. As soon as I receive your response I will give you the contact
of the Security Guard Service Company in Burkina Faso Ouagadougou. I will
also send you all the deposit information that will empower you as the
original- Beneficiary of this consignment. I want you and your church to
always pray for me.


PLEASE YOU ARE REQUESTED TO FORWARD TO ME THE FOLLOWING LISTED DETAILS OF
YOUR INFORMATION BELOW,


(1)  Your full
name:..............................................................

(2)  Your country of
origin:..................................................

(3)  Your home
address:.......................................................

(4)   Your current occupation:.............................................

(5)   Your direct mobile telephone number:......................

(6)   Your whatsapp number:..............................................

(7)   Your age /
sex:..............................................................

(8)   Your marital
status:....................................................

(9)    Your valid id card two passport photo graphs:....................


ALL THESE INFORMATION WILL BE USEFUL TO THE COMPANY WHICH WILL BE PROCESSED
AND PUT IN THEIR FILE.


My happiness is that I lived a life of a worthy Christian, whoever wants to
serve the Lord must serve Him in spirit and truth. Please this donation is
100% risk free and you must keep it secret and confidential to avoid
discouragement from your friends and family. Also I don't want any
disappointment or betrayal while this is going on. Get back to me via my
Email:  mrs.joesphinegupta@gmail.com


TAKE NOTE....

YOURS DYING SISTER
Mrs. Josephine Gupta
